patterns: What can you tell me about Ignite
What do you know about Ignite
What can you tell me about Ignite
What do you know about Ignite
responses: Students who perform exceptionally during the selection process (Smart Hiring or TCS NQT - for more Info visit TCS ION Portal) will get an opportunity to join the TCS Ignite unit TCS unique Science to Software and be trained on the latest and trending technologies, opening up avenues for a full-fledged global IT career.

TCS is a learning program for young science graduates who are selected to be employed in Tata Consultancy Services (TCS). This is an intense, six-month-long learning program to help orient science graduates from different academic disciplines to the IT industry and the corporate world. TCS Ignite has a team of world-class faculty who teach core courses in computing and business skills in a specially designed state-of-the-art learning space. Students who select in TCS ignite their training will be conducted in Chennai but now due to covid 19 maybe training will be taken on online-only, the timing of the training is from morning 8:30 AM to Evening 5:30 In that 1-hour lunch break. there are 6/3 months of training, after completion of ignite training projects will be assigned to you by the TCS managers

If you have any queries regarding your ILP ,ID Card,Webmail etc . These can be solved by raising a ticket through the Ultimatix Site by following steps. Step 1 : Click HELPDESK ------>  TCS GLOBAL HELPDESK. Step 2:  Two Columns will appear with Left Side column meant for Queries related to Ultimatix website such as Timesheet entry,iCals, Payroll etc Right Side Column is meant for IT Services related query such as Webmail etc. Step 3: Click Raise New Ticket for queries by filling in appropriate details and query. You can see your query details saved in Ticket Archives on left side. Step 4: Dont forget to Check the status of your ticket. If your ticket has been resolved, Please Close the ticket and give the feedback. Follow this step everytime when you log Ultimatix.

patterns: Give me some facts about Sastra University MCA Program
responses: TCS Ignite SASTRA University MCA Program is a collaborative tie-up with SASTRA University, Thanjavur, wherein students could gain industry experience as employees of TCS even as they top up their educational qualifications by pursuing an MCA degree from SASTRA University.
